Service.Title: Axon population generator
Service.Description: This generates an axon population for simulation which is distributed within the specified nerve geometry
Service.CLI: generate_axon_population axons.mat nerve.xml nerve.json units nMyelinated nUnmyelinated AE_ratio

Inputs.Name: axons.mat
Inputs.Label: Source axon populaton
Inputs.Description: Source axon population. The output axons will be sampled from the supplied file.

Inputs.Name: units
Inputs.Label: axon count units
Inputs.Description: one of {'per_mm2' | 'count' | 'ignore'}, how are the specified axon counts interpreted? (count could also be labelled per_nerve in the dropdown)

Inputs.Name: AE_ratio
Inputs.Label: Afferent/Efferent ratio
Inputs.Description: Ratio of sensory (afferent) to motor (efferent) axons in the generated population. The same ratio is used for both myelinated and unmyelinated axons.

Outputs.Name: axon-population.mat
Outputs.Label: generated axon population
Outputs.Description: synthetic axon population for the input nerve and axons set

Outputs.Name: axon-population.svg
Outputs.Label: visualisation of generated axon population
Outputs.Description: synthetic axon population for the input nerve and axons set
